question: 前面
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>front</kanji> <kanji>face</kanji> of something is the <vocabulary>front</vocabulary> or the <vocabulary>front side</vocabulary> of it (kind of like how <ja>外面</ja> is the exterior because it's the outside face). This also means <vocabulary>fore</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>forefront</vocabulary>, especially when used metaphorically.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
